glsa.title: systemd: Multiple vulnerabilities
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in systemd, the worst of which may allow execution of arbitrary code.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in systemd. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: An attacker could possibly execute arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, cause a Denial of Service condition, or gain escalated privileges.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All systemd users should upgrade to the latest version:
